title: Will the chat rooms return?
body:
At least in LAN we used to create chat rooms for gamemodes and premade double PI events.
But this has not happened for two years, and the chat rooms were removed with the new client.
Will any of these come back?

replies.body: I have personally heard much about the return of chat rooms, but slowly and surely we're adding a lot of the old features into the updated client. It's definitely something we could see return at some point in the future!
